title: If season resets/refresh will chat go back to normal
body: so i got 2 chat restricts now they say the next violation i do will lead me to ban my question now if the season reset does everything resets too? like if i get reported again will i go back to chat restrict 9-10 games if you guys know what i mean

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, a ranked season will not reset any sort of penalties on your account as a result of the [Instant Feedback System.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-)

You can move down the escalation path by exhibiting a trend of positive/neutral behavior that is consistent across the games you play. Let me know if you have any questions.

oh thanks for clearing out for me one last thing "You can move down the escalation path by exhibiting a trend of positive/neutral behavior that is consistent across the games you play" so i can do it by getting honors or not getting reported?
Honors may play a role in it, however, your behavior in-game and how you interact with others will be the biggest determining factors in moving up or down the escalation path.
It won't reset with the new season, the only way to improve your account standing is to show improved behavior on it across a long period of time.
so you mean i can change it instead of getting ban again i can put it to chat restrict by being nice and respectful?
but the process will take a long time is that what you mean sorry for being slow
